title: Free Agency Frenzy, Cousins To Vikings Highlights Wild Day (Football 03/13)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Pete Prisco and Jason La Canfora to break down the crazy day of moves in the NFL, highlighted by Kirk Cousins agreeing to go to the Vikings. The guys discuss the risks of the deal and what will make it successful, while also analyzing quarterback movement with Case Keenum headed to the Broncos, Sam Bradford headed to the Cardinals, and then, Drew Brees staying put. Will, Pete and Jason talk about the Packers' decisions to bring in Jimmy Graham and let go of Jordy Nelson, the meaning of Andrew Norwell to the Jags, the wide receiver market, the Bears new-look offense, and Malcolm Butler's potential impact in Tennessee.
